name: NSTextViewportLayoutControllerDelegate
desc: Optional methods that delegates implement to reposond to viewport layout changes.

items.name: func textViewportLayoutController(NSTextViewportLayoutController, configureRenderingSurfaceFor: NSTextLayoutFragment)
items.desc: The method the framework calls when the layout controller lays out a text layout fragment in the UI.

items.name: func textViewportLayoutControllerDidLayout(NSTextViewportLayoutController)
items.desc: The method the framework calls when the text viewport layout controller finishes its layout process.

items.name: func textViewportLayoutControllerWillLayout(NSTextViewportLayoutController)
items.desc: The method the framework calls before the text viewport layout controller starts its layout process.

items.name: func viewportBounds(for: NSTextViewportLayoutController) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the current viewport, which is the view visible bounds plus the overdraw area.
